# bg

```{r echo=FALSE}
opar <- par(no.readonly=TRUE)
```

```{r}
par(bg = "blue")
plot(1:10)

par(bg = "#F0F0F0")
plot(1:10)

par(bg = "#DCE6EC")
plot(1:10)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
par(opar)
```

opar <- par(no.readonly=TRUE)
